code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskItem=_ref=>{let{task,onDelete,onToggleComplete}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`flex justify-between items-center p-4 border-b ${task.completed?'bg-green-100':'bg-white'}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:task.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:task.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500",children:[task.dueDate," | ",task.category]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onToggleComplete(task.id),className:`mr-2 ${task.completed?'text-red-500':'text-green-500'}`,children:task.completed?'Mark Incomplete':'Mark Complete'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(task.id),className:"text-red-500",children:"Delete"})]})]});};export default TaskItem;
